random_name_desc: Pick a random name from a list for daily standups or tasks.
sprint_retro_desc: Simple retro board with Start, Stop, and Continue columns.
merge_pdf_desc: Combine multiple PDF files into one single document.
split_pdf_desc: Separate one PDF into individual pages or distinct files.
pdf_to_image_desc: Convert PDF pages into high-quality JPG or PNG images.
image_to_pdf_desc: Convert images to a single PDF.
rearrange_pdf_desc: Merge, re-order, delete pages, and compress output.
compress_pdf_desc: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality.
unlock_pdf_desc: Remove password protection from PDF files.
image_to_base64_desc: Convert images to Base64 strings instantly.
compress_image_desc: Compress JPG, PNG, SVG, and GIFs while saving space and maintaining quality.
blur_sensitive_info_desc: Pixelate or blur specific regions of an image to hide sensitive data.
remove_bg_desc: Remove image background automatically and replace it with color or gradient.
image_to_text_desc: Extract text from images using Optical Character Recognition.
